original_title: President appoints new Chairman and members to Public Service Commission
original_body_lines: Retired Senior Sri Lanka Administrative Service (SLAS) Officer Sanath Jayantha Ediriweera has been appointed as the Chairman of the Public Service Commission.
Accordingly, Ediriweera and six other commission members were appointed by President Ranil Wickremesinghe today (06 April), after the recommendations of the Constitutional Council were approved.
